    services such as waste management, Process Control, Production Engineering, Power and BioEnergy manufacturers. UWS is a BEE firm (a 100% black operation). We involve our services in

  dark: false

Our target market is everyone who uses a refuse bin and industries. Currently few house recycle their own waste This can increase the percentage of waste we recycle as a country',

sourcesContent:
import homeObjOneImg from "../../images/svg-1.svg";
import homeObjTwoImg from "../../images/svg-2.svg";
import homeObjThreeImg from "../../images/svg-3.svg";
import homeObjFiveImg from "../../images/svg-5.svg";

export const homeObjTwo = {
    id: 'about',
    lightBg: false,
    lightText: false,
    lightTextDesc: false,
    topLine: 'Our Vision & Mission ',
    headLine: 'ABOUT UBUHLEBEZWE WASTE SOLUTIONS',
    description: 'Our Vision is to convert every household and industry to being environmental conservationist. Our Mission is to empower every household to segregate their waste from the comfort of their homes and workplace',
   
    
    // buttonLabel: 'Get started',
    imgStart: false,
    img: homeObjOneImg,
    alt: 'Car',
    primary: true,
    darkText: false,
    dark: true,
    lightTextDesc: true

}

export const homeObjOne = {
    id: 'discover',
    lightBg: true,
    lightText: false,
    lightTextDesc: false,
    topLine: 'software developer',
    headLine: 'ABOUT UBUHLEBEZWE WASTE SOLUTIONS',
    description: `Ubuhlebezwe Waste Solutions (Pty) Ltd (hereafter referred to as UWS) is a South African private
    company (SMME) with registration number 2020/841055/07 founded to provide essential
    services such as waste management, Process Control, Production Engineering, Power and BioEnergy manufacturers. UWS is a BEE firm (a 100% black operation). We involve our services in
    BEE initiatives and maintain standards of good conduct directed at the growth and survival of the
    business in order to ensure the future.
    We are a customer-driven business that brings value to our consumers in the form of World Class
    Engineering and waste solutions to ensure that our clients concentrate on what they do best.
    Not only can we respect promises, but also we are proven to reach challenging deadlines when
    offering nothing but the finest. UWS (Pty) Ltd is well known for its innovations.
    We are now in the process of gaining accreditation from the appropriate industry regulatory
    bodies to ensure that we are a professionally certified and approved company `,
    // buttonLabel: 'Get started',
    
    imgStart: true,
    img: homeObjTwoImg,
    alt: 'Car',
    primary: false,
    darkText: true,
    dark:  false,

}

export const homeObjThree = {
    id: 'signup',
    lightBg: true,
    lightText: false,
    lightTextDesc: false,
    topLine: 'Our Values & Markets',
    headLine: 'Values & Markets',
    description: 'Our people and the community they live in. To conserve the environment in a safety manner that is not harmful to individuals and the environment. Our target market is everyone who uses a refuse bin and industries. Currently few house recycle their own waste This can increase the percentage of waste we recycle as a country',
    // buttonLabel: 'Get started',
    imgStart: true,
    img: homeObjThreeImg,
    alt: 'Car',
    dark: false,
    primary: false,
    darkText: true 

}
export const homeObjFive = {
    id: 'about',
    lightBg: false,
    lightText: false,
    lightTextDesc: false,
    topLine: 'Our Staff',
    headLine: 'Staff',
    description: `The employees to be hired would involve red seal artisans, professionals, semi-skilled and general
    workers in the service-oriented industries. Management duty is to ensure that the human
    resources given have the ability to carry out the roles or duties delegated on the basis of adequate
    knowledge, preparation, expertise and experience. The requisite expertise shall be determined
    and, where appropriate, the necessary standard of preparation shall be given. Where preparation
    is given, it shall be reviewed to ensure that it is successful and that disciplinary action is taken
    where necessary. We evaluate the client's requirements and align the relevant resources to
    execute the project professionally. We constantly aspire to build a team that maintains a high
    level of punctuality, courtesy, accountability, vehicle care and efficiency. In exchange, the
    organization provides its workers with a package above market rates and benefits. Records of all
    education, training, skills and experience shall be retained for a given time as defined by law or
    company policy. All staff employed signs a contract of employment whereby they agree to abide
    by the terms and conditions of the company as well as client specific employment terms`,
    // buttonLabel: 'Get started',
    imgStart: false,
    img: homeObjFiveImg,
    alt: 'Car',
    primary: true,
    darkText: false,
    dark: true
}
